task.title: Calculating the hours in a large number of minutes or seconds
task.shortdesc: This topic describes how to use World Time Pro to calculate how many hours, minutes and seconds are in a large number of minutes or seconds.

taskbody.context: This procedure describes an easy and accurate way to calculate how many hours, minutes and seconds are in a large number of minutes or seconds.

step.cmd: In the main calculation pane, do one of the following in the upper row of entry fields:

choices.choice: Type the minutes you want to convert in the Min field.
Type the seconds you want to convert in the Seconds field.

taskbody.result: The number of minutes or seconds appears in hours, minutes and seconds in the result fields.
taskbody.example: For example, to calculate how many hours, minutes and seconds are in 2607 seconds, type 2607 in the Seconds field in the upper row of entry fields. Click Plus, then click Equals. The result of 43 min 27 sec appears in the result fields.
